traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Muiral fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Muiral makes three attacks: two with his longsword and one with his sting.

actions.name: Longsword
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage, or 15 (2d10 + 4 damage) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Sting
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. 9 (1d10 + 4 damage) piercing damage. The target must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (6d8 damage) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Lunging Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Muiral makes one longsword attack that has a reach of 10 feet.

legendary.name: Retreating Strike (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Muiral moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks. Before the move, he can make one longsword attack.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: Muiral is a 13th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 17}, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). He has the following wizard spells prepared:
